name: Minimalist Reader (for The Old Reader)
description:
A few very simple adjustments to The Old Reader to make it look a little more elegant and easier to read:
  • additional padding around entries
  • larger headlines for better overall hierarchy on larger monitors
  • slightly larger text and better spacing for readability
  • margins around images so they don't do strange things to the text
  • nicer blockquotes, with a subtle gray background and rounded corners
